comment: I thought professor Guerra was a great professor. I am not sure what all these low ratings are about. She works with you on every assignment and always gives time in class to work on them. This course is not made to be the easiest, it's like that with every professor. It's the course, not the professor. Just take her.

Dr.Guerra is a caring professor who wants you to do well. I enjoyed being in her class and her lectures were interesting. She will give you feedback on each assignment before you turn it in, so take advantage of that! If you use her feedback and make changes she will give you a good grade.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: Lessons were very long and she wasn't super helpful. If you can, take someone else!!!

Don't be intimidated to take her class. She's a great professor and understanding when you talk to her. Honestly, her lectures are long, attendance is mandatory. When she assigns projects, her directions may seem vague but in reality it's leeway for how you want to set up your work. She gives the opportunity to review your work before submission.

The professor displayed bias towards Latinas, exhibited racism towards other races, lacked clear guidelines for grading, administered irrelevant quizzes, and showed open rudeness, disrespect, and indifference towards students.
Racists! Showed complete biases towards my classmates who were white/black (me being Latina) she was just ok.
Never clear with her assignments. Wont know your grade till the end !!!! Beware

This professor is terrible. We never knew our grade until the end of the semester. She is very rude and truly doesn't care about her students well being. Her expectations for assignments aren't clear and she plays favoritism with her students. (Not sure why it rated her has awesome for my last post )

This professor is terrible. We never knew our grade until the end of the semester. She is very rude and truly doesn't care about her students well being. Her expectations for assignments  aren't clear and she plays favoritism with her students.
Always contradicting herself. Rubrics arent clear.
Literally the most irresponsible professor I have ever had. NEVER responds to emails, is sooo unclear on instructions, I could go on.

I took this class asynchronously and it was mostly about getting your work done. She waited until the end of the semester to start grading everything but is an easy grader. When you sign up for a group at the beginning of the semester you will be doing several assignments in that same group. Start the assessment assignment early it is a long one!

She does not respond to emails. The instructions for the big assignments are not given until the end of the semester. The big assignments are very difficult. Wish we could have received them earlier. She waits until the end of the semester to grade.

She's nice and sometimes willing to adjust due dates. Class is boring and I did a lot of hw for other classes in there. Group projects are frequent if she thinks yall aren't paying attention. Some quizzes too. Not very clear about her grading criteria. She'll say what she wants in an assignment and then grade it depending on something else.

I was unsure about her at first but she was an ok teacher and she is nice. I didn't learn much in the class but there weren't many assignments and she is an easy grader. She can be hard to understand sometimes and struggles to communicate what she wants from an assignment. Her class is pretty boring and we really don't do much while we are there.

This class was easy and I recommend taking her. I made a 98 in the class. She extends deadlines and is flexible if you have any problems in your field experience. There are 3 bigger assignments and a few weekly reading summaries. Lectures can be long, but she likes people to participate and show at least some understanding of the content.

This is the easiest class i have ever taken at KSU. I literally made a 100 in the class. Class is mandatory and the lecture is very long but this is an easy A. Dr. G always extended dates and helped everyone. There are very few asssignments so make sure you do them all. I didnt learn a lot it was basically like a review of math 2008 & 3316. No HW.

This class was an Easy A. Dr. Guerra was really good about extending deadlines and making assignments easier for the class. I didn't really learn too much honestly, the content could've been covered in 2 or 3 classes instead of the first semester. Very easy grader, I got A's on everything and she really understands the content. I would suggest her.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: She cares a lot about math and that future students will actually enjoy math so that is super good to know she cares. The assignments this semester have been changed/cancelled a few times due to confusion with requirements. Other than that, she is knowledgeable and definitely wants participation. Very understanding!
rating_tags: Participation matters--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: She is a sweetheart. She wants everyone to love her class. She can be confusing with her assignments. A lot of group work.

Her class is a bit boring for the 2 hour and 45 minute TOSS class, but she really does care and she yearns for her students to be interested in what she has to say. The course load is pretty minimal compared to other TOSS classes, and the textbook readings are short and sweet. All that she goes over is relevant and useful.
